810 good game loved the visuals story and characters in it as a huge batman fan it was fantastic to play through the game however one drawback i found was that the game doesnt do the best job in directing you on where you should be i always got lost most of the time and that affected the pacing for the overall game for me other than that i loved it very much recommend it to both batman fans and non batman fans
